con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:common:v2_0" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentVerifyResponse> <urn1:ResponseState> <wsc:ErrorCode>?</wsc:ErrorCode> <wsc:Severity>?</wsc:Severity> <wsc:ComponentId>?</wsc:ComponentId> <wsc:Message>?</wsc:Message> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:LogSequence>?</wsc:LogSequence> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <wsc:errorItem key="?" value="?"/> </urn1:ResponseState> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <urn2:paymentStatus>?</urn2:paymentStatus> <urn2:errorCode>?</urn2:errorCode> <urn2:severity>?</urn2:severity> <urn2:message>?</urn2:message> <urn2:numberOfTransactions>?</urn2:numberOfTransactions> </urn:paymentStatusUpdateSummary> <!--0 to 500 repetitions:--> <urn:paymentStatusUpdateResult> <urn2:messageId>?</urn2:messageId> <urn2:paymentInfoId>?</urn2:paymentInfoId> <urn2:transactionId>?</urn2:transactionId> <urn2:paymentStatus>?</urn2:paymentStatus> <urn2:errorCode>?</urn2:errorCode> <urn2:severity>?</urn2:severity> <urn2:message>?</urn2:message> </urn:paymentStatusUpdateResult> </urn:PaymentVerifyResponse> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: PaymentApprove
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v2_0" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:payment-status-update:v2_0"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${DataSource#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${DataSource#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>${DataSource#Function}</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>${DataSource#Version}</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${DataSource#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${DataSource#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${DataSource#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${DataSource#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <wsc:orgunit>${DataSource#orgunit}</wsc:orgunit> <wsc:customerid>${DataSource#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>${DataSource#locale}</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>${DataSource#ip}</wsc:ip> <wsc:item key="${DataSource#itemkey1}" value="${DataSource#value1}"/> <wsc:item value="${DataSource#value2}" key="${DataSource#itemkey2}"/> <wsc:item value="${DataSource#value3}" key="${DataSource#itemkey3}"/> <wsc:item value="${DataSource#value4}" key="${DataSource#itemkey4}"/> <wsc:item value="${DataSource#value5}" key="${DataSource#itemkey5}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentApproveRequest> <urn:transactionInput> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn1:transactionId>${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}</urn1:transactionId> </urn:transactionInput> </urn:PaymentApproveRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT M.MESSAGEID, M.AGREEMENTID, M.MARKETTYPE, T.INSTRUCTEDAMOUNT,T.EQUIVALENTAMOUNT,T.FK_PAYMENTINFOID, T.TRANSACTIONSID,T.PAYMENTSTATUS,T.DEBETACCOUNTNO, T.RELEASEDATE,T.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID,T.REQUESTEDEXECUTIONDATE, T.BOOKINGLEVEL,T.RISKSTATUS,T.PEPROCESSINGLINE FROM TRANSACTIONS T, MESSAGE M , PAYMENTINFO P WHERE M.MESSAGEID = P.FK_MESSAGEID AND P.PAYMENTINFOID = T.FK_PAYMENTINFOID AND M.MARKETTYPE = 'BM' AND TRANSACTIONSID IN ('${PaymentCreate#Response#declare namespace ns4='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; declare namespace ns2='urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0'; //ns2:PaymentCreateResponse[1]/ns2:paymentResult[1]/ns4:transactionId[1]}')

SELECT M.MESSAGEID, M.AGREEMENTID, M.MARKETTYPE, T.INSTRUCTEDAMOUNT,T.DEBIT_BOOKING_ID,T.EQUIVALENTAMOUNT, T.FK_PAYMENTINFOID,T.TRANSACTIONSID,T.PAYMENTSTATUS, T.DEBETACCOUNTNO,T.RELEASEDATE,T.FK_PROCESSINGLINEID, T.REQUESTEDEXECUTIONDATE,T.BOOKINGLEVEL,T.RISKSTATUS, T.PEPROCESSINGLINE FROM TRANSACTIONS T, MESSAGE M , PAYMENTINFO P WHERE M.MESSAGEID = P.FK_MESSAGEID AND P.PAYMENTINFOID = T.FK_PAYMENTINFOID AND TRANSACTIONSID IN (${FetchTransactions#Transactions})
SELECT * FROM RESERVATION_DETAILS WHERE FK_TRANSACTIONSID IN (${FetchTransactions#Transactions})
